sentences.sContent: the northwest suburbs of the city
Take the narrow lane going northwest parallel with the railway line.
sentences.sCn: 走那条与铁路线平行的通向西北的窄路。

phrases.pCn: 西北航空（财富500强公司之一，总部位于美国，主要经营航空公司）

words.tran: 北方的，向北的；来自北方的
西北大风，西北来的风暴

trans.tranCn: 西北的；向西北的；来自西北的
trans.tranOther: a northwest wind comes from the northwest
the direction that is exactly between north and west

trans.tranCn: 在西北；向西北；来自西北
trans.tranOther: If you go northwest, you travel toward the northwest
